subject: No confirmation email received
description_text:
Hello, i ve placed and order last night yesterday using this email address.
I haven't received a confirmation email with an order number to track my
order. Please help me track my order. Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Cezar Claudiu,  Please provide the payment date, payment amount, and the payer’s name, and I will help you look up the corresponding order number.

Hello, the payment date as per my bank is 27.12.2025 at 23:19
I guess this is the time at which the transaction passed and the money was
transferred. The payment amount was 2428.28 RON.
The order contained the bundle "newest simsonn plus x with haptics and a
simsonn hs pro shiftrr h/sq, before paying using a disccount code OFF8.
Hi Cezar Claudiu,    I have resent your order confirmation. Please check your email. Additionally, I noticed you did not provide your postal code. Please provide it as soon as possible.
Thank you, i got it. The postal code is 010459.
